texto: management systems — Fundamentals and vocabulary 3 Terms and definitions For the purposes of this document, the terms and definitions given in ISO 9000:2015 apply. ISO and IEC maintain terminological databases for use in standardization at the following addresses: — ISO Online browsing platform: available at https://​w ww​.iso​.org/​obp — IEC Electropedia: available at http://​w ww​.electropedia​.org/​ 4 Quality of an organization and sustained success 4.1 Quality of an organization The quality of an organization is the degree to which the inherent characteristics of the organization fulfil the needs and expectations of its customers and other interested parties, in order to achieve
